mapper.sql: id, is_delete, gmt_modified, gmt_create, user_id, type
mapper.select:
select
from af_user_register_type where user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND is_delete = 0
mapper.update:
update af_user_register_type
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_modified = now(),
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
